creditline: The Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
description: Holy Family at R with Joseph feeding donkey, Mary kneeling beside manger with baby Jesus and two angels; vertical beam at center of image separates four shepherds at L with two sheep, looking on
provenance: [Craddock and Barnard, London]; Sotheby's, London, March 30, 2010, lot 8
signed: LLC, in the plate: [Annibal Caracius fecit et inue.]
title: The Adoration of the Shepherds
